price: [Dirán los que se negaron a creer:] "¡Oh, Señor nuestro! Aparta de nosotros el castigo, somos creyentes".
arabic: رَّبَّنَا ٱكۡشِفۡ عَنَّا ٱلۡعَذَابَ إِنَّا مُؤۡمِنُونَ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: rabbanā ik'shif ʿannā al-ʿadhāba innā mu'minūna
